workflow.display-name: Delete a Computer from AD by Name

param.name: computerName
param.description: The name of the Computer object to delete from AD

param.name: alsoDeleteComputerSubtree
param.description: True performs a more thorough delete of the Computer object

workflow-item.name: item2
workflow-item.description: Deletes a computer from an Active Directory instance.

workflow-item.name: item3
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item4
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item5
workflow-item.script: //Generated by the system, cannot be edited return (alsoDeleteComputerSubtree == true) ;

workflow-item.name: item6
workflow-item.description: Deletes a computer from an Active Directory instance and all objects within the computer subtree.

workflow-item.name: item7
workflow-item.script: System.log("Performing a simple Computer object deletion (ignoring subtree).");
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item8
workflow-item.script: System.log("Performing a thorough Computer object deletion (includes subtree).");
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.thinkahead.activedirectory").getAdComputerByName(computerName) ;

bind.name: computerName
bind.description: The name of the Computer object to find in AD

workflow-item.description: Returns an AD Computer object for the specified computer name.

p-param.name: computerName
p-param.desc: The name of the Computer object to delete from AD

p-param.name: alsoDeleteComputerSubtree
p-param.desc: True performs a more thorough delete of the Computer object
